ChildNodes.Name: language
ChildNodes.Description:
Name of the Language in its language;
E.g.: German = Deutsch

ChildNodes.Name: Left side
ChildNodes.Description: Left side of the window (Look, i know this group doesnt make sense, but i need to present how groups work ok?)

ChildNodes.Name: loaded
ChildNodes.Description: Used to display the name of the active language

ChildNodes.Name: status
ChildNodes.Description:
Telling the user the amount of languages loaded;
#COUNT gets replaced by the number of loaded languages (do not translate this "word"!)
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: There are #COUNT languages loaded right now.

ChildNodes.Name: info
ChildNodes.Description: Info to inform the user to select a language
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Select a language from the left hand menu.

ChildNodes.Name: thanks
ChildNodes.Description: a little something at the bottom of the window
